entry.title: Monday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow early in the morning and 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 1 May 2023
